title: The critics are wrong.
review: This visually stunning movie grossed more money than the Harry Potters and Avatar. But the critics and actors that were not involved with this film (probably due to their snobbiness) were upset. So they lowered the rating of this film for a new generation of movie goers, who appreciate Joss Wheatons humor and vision.

title: Damn good!
review: Horror is a difficult gene to perfect all of the time. Fortunately, they do a decent job with the IT remake.

title: Feeding hate with hate
review: The more Hollywood keeps promoting racial tension's in movies, the more 'race' is going to play a factor in our society. Obviously racism exist, but it will always exist if Hollywood keep's bringing it up.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Star Wars fans are lame. Its actually good.
review: Just enjoy the movie and be great someone bothered to entertain the fan theory.Good day!

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Disney ruins everything.
review: J.J. Abrams is actually a good director, but with Disney micromanaging every decision like they did in Deadpool 2, things are becoming childish.
